Title Title One
URL https://urlone.com
Option Cookie

Title Title Two
Option Cookie
URL https://urltwo.com

Option DomainCookieOnly
Title Title Three
URL https://urlthree.com
Find "http:\/\/somehost.somedb.com\/
Option Cookie
Replace "http:\/\/^Psomehost.somedb.com^\/

Option DomainCookieOnly
Option Cookie
Title Title Four
URL https://urlfour.com
Option Cookie
